TransactionStateContext.CreditorsState: Users are added to the creditorAddresses array when addCreditors is called.
TransactionStateContext.EmptyState: The creditorAddresses array is emptied if it exceeds a length of 1500 through the emptyCreditors function.

ExternalInteractions.CreditorAddressesArray: Users interact with the contract to add themselves to the creditorAddresses array using addCreditors.
ExternalInteractions.EmptyArrayCondition: The array can only be emptied under the conditional check in emptyCreditors if its length exceeds 1500.
